titles.title: To permit landowners to assert otherwise available State law defenses against real property claims by Indian tribes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 10/18/2000--Introduced. Permits the defendant in any real property claim by an Indian tribe to assert any defense that would be available under State law to a defendant opposing an analogous claim that does not involve an Indian tribe.
